document_data.name: Vuzlyn Freth
document_data.mainbody: '''Vuzlyn Freth''' was a [[drow]] in [[Menzoberranzan]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]] and a member of [[House Freth]]. He was one of [[Houndaer Tuin'Tarl]] and [[Syrzan]]'s rebel group.
document_data.History: During the [[Silence of Lolth]] in the {{YearlinkName|1372}}, Vuzlyn joined Houndaer's group desiring to start a slave revolt. Vuzlyn and [[Alton Vandree]] were, among others, summoned to [[Pharaun Mizzrym]] and [[Ryld Argith]], as might be some of the males they needed to find.
